mapper.select: SELECT m.userid userid, m.userName userName, m.usermail usermail FROM user m WHERE m.userName = #{userName} AND m.usermail = #{usermail}
SELECT m.userid userid, m.userName userName, m.userEmail usermail FROM user m WHERE m.userid = #{userid} AND m.userName = #{userName} AND m.userEmail = #{usermail}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET userpw = #{userpw}, userName = #{userName}, updatedate = now() WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (userid, userpw, username, usermail) VALUES (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{userName}, #{usermail})
